subject: I know where you live

subject: Threatening your business license
body: I'm filing formal complaints with the state licensing board, Better Business Bureau, and consumer protection division. Your business license will be revoked. You won't be operating much longer.

subject: Coming to your office tomorrow

subject: You're all going down

subject: Physical threats

subject: Blackmail attempt

subject: Violent language

subject: Stalking behavior

subject: tina let's discuss skill assessments.
body: Greetings tina, I hope you're doing well. I've been considering the importance of regular skill assessments in our field. It's something I believe can really boost our team's effectiveness.
